long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to helps promotes resources at the University of Virginia libraries. This extension recommends items available at UVA libraries to patrons based on their search on Barnes and Noble, Amazon and Google Scholar. In the extension pop up, patrons can search the libraryâ€™s catalog in the search bar and view results, view their search history and modify setting to search for different categories.
